Description:
This week on The Download, Andrea covers the massive wave of new AI models, including GPT-5.3-Codex, Claude Opus 4.6, and Claude Sonnet 4.6. We also dive into GitHub's new agentic workflows and Agent HQ, allowing AI to fix CI failures and write code directly from issues. Plus, learn about the new repo-level pull request controls to stop spam. Finally, we discuss the OpenClaw creator joining OpenAI, the sunsetting of the CIA World Factbook, and the 25th anniversary of the Agile Manifesto.
